name: xpath_advanced_selection
description: Complex data extraction using XPath expressions

args: import requests; from lxml import html; response = requests.get('https://example.com'); tree = html.fromstring(response.content); title = tree.xpath('//title/text()')[0]; heading = tree.xpath('//h1/text()')[0]; print(f'Title: {title}'); print(f'Heading: {heading}')

expected_output.example:
Title: Example Domain
Heading: Example Domain

XPath extraction successful

args: import requests; from lxml import html; response = requests.get('https://example.com'); tree = html.fromstring(response.content); links = tree.xpath('//a/@href'); link_texts = tree.xpath('//a/text()'); print(f'Links: {len(links)}'); [print(f'  {text}: {href}') for text, href in zip(link_texts, links)]

expected_output.example:
Links: 1
  More information...: https://www.iana.org/domains/example

XPath attribute and text extraction

args: import requests; from lxml import html; response = requests.get('https://example.com'); tree = html.fromstring(response.content); paragraphs = tree.xpath('//p'); print(f'Paragraphs found: {len(paragraphs)}'); [print(f'P{i+1}: {p.text_content()[:50]}...') for i, p in enumerate(paragraphs)]

expected_output.example:
Paragraphs found: 2
P1: This domain is for use in illustrative examples...
P2: More information...

Complex XPath query
